name: ContentSyncDxpExportBlobs
description: Content synchronizer - Export blobs from specified container. (Optimizely DXP)
author: Ove Lartelius
releaseNotes:
v2.1.3: Try connect function 
v2.0.3: Created task

inputs.name: ClientKey
inputs.label: DXP target environment ClientKey
inputs.helpMarkDown: The DXP project ClientKey. Generated in the PAAS interface.

inputs.name: ClientSecret
inputs.label: DXP target environment ClientSecret
inputs.helpMarkDown: The DXP project ClientSecret. Generated in the PAAS interface.

inputs.name: ProjectId
inputs.label: Project Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The DXP ProjectId (GUID). Look in the URL when in PAAS for your project. You will see the GUID as part of the URL.

inputs.name: Environment
inputs.label: Source environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: The environment that you you want to deploy from.

inputs.name: DxpContainer
inputs.label: DXP container
inputs.helpMarkDown: The container in DXP where your blobs are located.

inputs.name: RetentionHours
inputs.label: Retention hours (in hours)
inputs.helpMarkDown: By default, the bacpac file is retained for 24 hours unless otherwise the retention hour is overridden.

inputs.name: TryConnect
inputs.label: Try connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will try to connect to the stageaccount container and show count of blobs.

inputs.name: RunVerbose
inputs.label: Run Verbose
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you want to run in verbose mode and see all information.

inputs.name: ErrorActionPreference
inputs.label: ErrorActionPreference
inputs.helpMarkDown: Prepends the line `$ErrorActionPreference = 'VALUE'` at the top of your script.
